snippet.title: DOUBLE DRAGON ADVANCE Launch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Considered a masterpiece of the series, Double Dragon Advance makes a 20-year homecoming with this current-gen port, bringing back action, graphics, and other elements from past installments. New additions include five snazzy wallpapers to adorn your screen with dragon debonair befitting a martial arts master.

■Product Information
Title name: Double Dragon Advance
Genre: 2D Side Scroller Action
Available on: PlayStation®4／Nintendo Switch™／Xbox One／Xbox SeriesX│S／Steam
Release date: November 9th, 2023
Expected retail price: US$6.99

© ATLUS / ARC SYSTEM WORKS
